item.description: i was lucky enough to be one of the winners of the @elizavecca_ milkypiggy kangsi-pack face mask from @0.8l_usa and I üíõ! I received it in the mail the other day & was so excited when I opened it and realized it also came with a brush to apply it, I find that applying face masks this way ensures a more smooth & even application. when you first put it on its this lovely shade of orange (about the same as the orange on the bottle) and it's SHIMMERY!

Time for the Kangsi Pack Elizavecca Milkypiggy review! So something interesting about this product is that it actually comes with a brush which you don't get often. It feels REALLY nice. As for the product itself, it smells like perfume. But while applying the mask, my eyes started to sting from the aroma. (None of the product got into my eyes lol) However, after cleaning it off, my face felt clean.

Trying out my Kangsi pack by Elizavecca Milkypiggy and I'm SO in love with the scent. It smells a perfume/fresh scent, it's like a golden colour - 24k gold infused powder- and once it dries it turns white. (it has SPARKLES in the white!!üôÉ) You leave it on for 20 mins then rinse with warm water. Love love love!!!! üòçüòçüòç #elizaveccamilkypiggy #pandabox #korean #koreancosmetics #beauty #love #happy #golden #kangsipack #elizavecca #milkypiggy #elizaveccakangsipack

Elizabeth. A Milky Piggy Kangsi pack from @08liter_usa love this mask, it's easy to use, so creamy, love the smell and it's easy to wash. After using it I can really feel that my skin soften and become smoother. üòä #elizavecca #kangsipack #koreancosmetics #facemask #detoxmask #08L #08literusa A post shared by Bea Norato üêù (@beabee28) on Nov 10, 2016 at 2:45pm PST

Really enjoying trying out some #elizavecca #milkypiggy products! The #kangsipack mask goes on gold and dries down white, claiming to "promote smooth and radiant skin... balances the skin‚Äôs natural hydration." I didn't feel hydrated after but it didn't upset my #dryskin and I feel nice and smooth so we'll see how it goes! üê∑üêΩüêñ #masks #facemask #facemasks #beauty #skin #skincare #kbeauty #complexion #koreanbeauty #cosmetics #face #pamper #kawaii #cute #pigs #piggy

So, I finally got to try the Elizavecca Kangsi Pack. It was sent to me courtesy of @elizavecca_ and @0.8L_usa in exchange for my honest review, and it came with a mask brush! Hooray! This wash-off mask is heavily scented, much like every other product I've used from this company, but I didn't find the fragrance unpleasant. When I painted it on, I was gold and shimmery, but as this mask dries, it turns white and chalky.
üòç üòçüòç #kangsipack #elizaveccamilkypiggy #tonymoly #foamcleanser #skincare #beauty #health #koreanproduct A post shared by üå∏Se√±ora Paponaüå∏ (@mau_marbles) on Jan 16, 2017 at 6:02pm PST

About to try this face mask my sister gave me for Christmas for the first time. #milkypiggy #24Kgold #kangsipack #japanesefacemask A post shared by J. Adams (@o_ophelia5310) on Jan 26, 2017 at 6:28pm PST

This is the first time trying this #facemask. I'm kinda not sure about this one. It goes on a gold color and dries white. At first I thought it was a peel off mask because it started drying so quick around the edges but found out it's not. It smells good unlike some face products. It also stayed cold on my face the whole time it was drying. My problem with this is that it left my skin itchy.

item.title: Elizavecca Milky Piggy Kangsi Pack-Wrinkle care Deep Cleansing
item.description: Beneficial Ingredients : 24K Gold, 7 types of berry components How it works : 24K gold Facial Mask formulated with 7 types of berry components - Clean pores, remove dead skin cells, dirt and toxins, minimizes pore, firm your skin, refine skin texture, help your skin look more soft and radiant Recommended for : all skin types, especially good for oily with large pores Suggested use : Squeeze out a generous amount of the pack and apply evenly all over clean face.

item.title: Milky Piggy Kangsi Pack-Wrinkle care Deep Cleansing
